Name: Steam Ocean
About the game: This game uses Unity + Oculus jointly developed a VR3D type of shooting game, players need to use OculusVR device to connect after opening this game, this game is VR panoramic 3D type, players will come to the first level after starting the game, players need to use the handle to pick up the gun to destroy the monsters in the scene, when the player destroys a monster will add a point, when the destroyed monster reaches a certain score, the game will open the second level, The difficulty of the second level is often more difficult than the first level, so take up the weapon in your hand and destroy the monsters in the sci-fi scene!
Developers: Beijing Timing Art Culture and Arts Co., Ltd.
Publishers: Beijing Timing Art Culture and Arts Co., Ltd.
